articles.title: Europe to launch Galileo satellite pair on Dec 2, set to join 26 others already in orbit - India Today
articles.description: Managed and funded by the European Union, the current Galileo system consists of 26 satellites in all.

articles.title: Sony Xperia Pro-I Featuring 1-Inch Camera Sensor to Finally Go on Sale in December - NDTV
